archive.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a place where a large number of historical records are stored, or the records that are stored
archive.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: an archive of the writer’s unpublished work
archive.translation[0].definitions[1].de: copies of a computer’s files that are stored on a disk or in the computer’s memory in a way that uses less space than usual, so that the computer can keep them for a long time
archive.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to put documents, books, information etc in an archive
archive.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to save a computer file in a way that uses less space than usual, because you do not use that file often but may need it in the future
archive.translation[2].definitions[0].de: to make a permanent copy of information held in a computer or to store the information so that it cannot be changed or lost
archive.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Once a month the files will be archived.
archive.translation[3].definitions[0].de: the part of a computer or computer system where information is stored in such a way that it cannot be changed or lost
archive.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: You could rebuild your hard disk’s contents from this archive.
